title: Talkback radio with John Pearce
brief_description: Former Sydney Broadcaster John Pearce discusses his views on the relationship between talk-back radio and radio programming. Within his role as a talk-back radio host, he says he needed to remain in control of the calls and scored points off the callers as necessary in the interests of a high rating show. Interviewed by Bryon Quigley. No other credits available.
